website_summaries.verdict: Works well for outdoor adventures or as a campus companion.
pros: Soft-lined sleeve to keep laptops safe and secure
Holds all of your school  materials
cons: Pockets and side compartments are small

customer_reviews.title: Love the customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college books and computer. The third week of school the top ripped. I contacted under armour and they sent me a brand new one and I returned the ripped one. They stand behind everything!! 😊😊😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Ingesbooks

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy- fake product!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these- they are counterfeit. I bought 14 of the same one to be embroidered for a team gift. 11 from this seller and three from a different seller. The straps broke off in three places within the first 10 uses. Wondering why they were so awful, I compared next to another one bought from the other seller. The straps are narrow, the coloring is off, the padding on the back is missing, the tags are different, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made book bag
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for a couple months being used as a baby bag. Shoulder strap ripped from the bag tonight. The book bag has had at the MOST 10 pounds of stuff in it. For being so expensive it is poorly made!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fuerte

customer_reviews.title: My 10 yo son is in love with this backpack
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yo son is in love with this backpack. I was looking for one that was comparable in size to his LL Bean backpack, and this one is. I like the shoe compartment for the winter months, where he's bringing his sneaker to and from. He'll be using this for school, but it would make a great pack for sports as well. It's sharp looking with plenty or room, and the kids are crazy for UA brand. The only thing I can't speak for is the longevity since we just got it. It doesn't look as well made as LL Bean, but here's to hoping it'll last until he's tired of it and wants a change.
customer_reviews.author: ARF

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after 1 month light use
customer_reviews.text: First, it was way bigger than I was hoping for my my 9yr old. Better for an adult athlete as there are some cool storage pockets. But, we have only had it ONE month to the day and the strap straight broke! Like ripped at the seam where the shoulder strap meets the bottom back of the backpack. I am SO frustrated. It was barely used to hold a folder and lunch box. Waste of money.. ***UPDATE*** I contacted the seller and they were very apologetic and great customer service! They say they are refunding me the money for the backpack which is such a relief! For that I am changing my review from 2 stars to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: K Yo

customer_reviews.title: Good pack for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Using this for school in my 40 something days has been fun. Love the color. The backpack fits well on the shoulders. I am about 5’ 4” and I got tho fit perfectly on my back with a heavy load. That is even with days my shoulder was hurting quite a bit - past shoulder surgery. It has wide enough straps to give the best distribution of weight. It has a decent amount of pockets. I always could have just a couple extra cubbie pockets for this and that. But overall it did resist more than a few down pours. My books and folders stayed dry. I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dizou

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my daughter for the new school year, it didn't even last to December of said school year. She started 6th grade and hadn't needed to carry any text books thankfully. It was just filled up with basic school supplies and change of gym/practice clothes. The strap completely ripped and seperated from the top seams. She prefers Under Armour over most athletic brands so I reluctantly purchased her the Hustle 4.0 as a Christmas gift. We shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased Under Armour backpacks and always found them incredibly reliable. One strap on this one broke two weeks after I started using it (already outside the return window, as I did not start using it for two months after purchase. I rigged a steel wire to make it work, but then the other strap broke a week later. Very dissapointed in the drop in quality of what had always been a great product, will not buy from Under Armour again.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Jamele

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter in August 2016, who wanted a white backpack for back to school. Hard to find a white backpack in the typical stores. She loves it. It is December and it is still in great condition. Very versatile and she sure does pack a lot of stuff in it including her chromebook, which is in its own case. Very happy with this purchase and will order it again if she wants this same one for next school year.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Let's see if it can survive high school.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack to replace my son"s old Under Armour backpack, which finally succumbed to heavy High School student use. The backpack seems rugged enough, and well made, so it looks like it has potential. The old backpack lasted through Freshman year, and halfway through Sophomore year, so we were happy with that. At that point we bought a cheaper backpack, which didn't last a month- so, that is a very favourable comparison for Under Armour.
customer_reviews.author: 40MM

customer_reviews.title: It's a book bag
customer_reviews.text: I like it, looks nice, but hardly see what the fuss is about. Every kid is using an UA book bag and my son needed a new one, so we got this one. So far so good. Nice size for him, definitely big enough for any teenager. Can't say anything too great or terrible about it. The only book bag we ever had that was terrible was a Nike book bag that ripped out the bottom. This does have nice shoulder straps, and the zippers work better than his old Nike book bag did. Other than that, it arrived well and didn't smell. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: girlnextdoor

customer_reviews.title: Terrible book bag. No warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought bc our kindergartner wanted a red under armour book. bag We bought it in June 2019. 6 months later it is falling apart already! Amazon says it’s past the return window and under armour will not stand behind their product. They want me to send it to them and get a credit bc can’t tell me how much the credit is for so I don’t lose money. My son just takes a folder and lunch box to school so this is crazy that this is happening. Don’t not buy!
customer_reviews.author: cassieandpete

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: GREATEST backpack ever. On year 2 with it and its still going strong. Don't waste your money on the walmart/ local store crap. Buy this save yourself the time and energy. My 6 year old is super hard on everything and it is holding up great. All the zippers still work, no interior or exterior rips. You won't be sorry. Fits his school work, folders, snow pants, shoes etc. Work amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A backpack made to last
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second Under Armour backpack. The first made it thru three school years filled to capacity, enduring the wear and tear inflicted by a middle school boy. The backpack would have lasted even longer if sunscreen hadn't exploded in it over the summer. These backpacks are super durable and fit everything a student needs. Multiple pockets allow students to store smaller items (pens, flash drives, sticky notes) so they are not lost.
customer_reviews.author: AmyS

customer_reviews.title: A great bag at $54, holds a Case-It (snugly)
customer_reviews.text: We just received this, but the quality seems good, and I expect it to last through at least 1 full school year with a middle school boy. The bag holds a Case-It. It's a tad snug zipping around the second top corner, but it fits better than most bags, many of which don't hold one at all. (Although, we also got this other bag, which is excellent quality and EASILY holds a Case-It and more, at the same price:17.3 inch Laptop Backpack with Rain Cover Airbag Shockproof Water Resistant Travel Bag Work School College Backpacks for men and women,Black Business Backpack fit.)
customer_reviews.author: LeonaG

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap. Not like the older versions of the same bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this bag. I bought one from the store 3 years ago and it is amazing! When I got this one I expected it to be of the same quality but it felt and looked cheap compared to my 3 year old bag. We have put the original one through everything. It was originally used as a diaper bag and now we use to for when we travel or when we go to amusement parks. I throw it in the washer and air dry it and it doesn’t have a frayed string. I don’t recommend buying this bag now though. Definitely not the same quality bag as years previous.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Beyond cute
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is pricey. But if memory serves me right, all name brands are. This does have a decent amt of room. A sweet amt of pockets. I’m not going to use it as much as most people will. So if it doesn’t stand up and keep its integrity, I’m going to flip out hard. The color is one you never see in backpacks. I can’t stress the beauty of it. But I’m a big colors person and this is my favorite so I’ll admit the bias. More later as I use it more. So far so great. :-)
customer_reviews.author: HollyB

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other negative reviews about this backpack. I bought it for my 3rd grader at the beginning of the school year. In less than 3 months of light to moderate use, one of the straps broke. Of course, it's after the return window. This backpack was just used for carrying books to and from school, so it really just is a poor quality product if it can't do that for more than 3 months without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Three years later, still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag over three years ago, in 2016. I have used it daily for work, for travel, at the gym, even at the beach. It has held up remarkably over the years and continues to be my go-to bag. There is a plenty of available space among four pockets. As for the durability, the fact that it is still holding up strong after three years should answer that. If you take good care of it, it will take good care of you.
customer_reviews.author: A.A Ron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My perfect gym bag. Very comfortable and feels like a quality backpack. Lightweight, but still plenty of storage space. I pack all my gym clothes in here when I ride my bicycle to the gym. The pockets on the outside organize all my smaller items (wallet, phone, keys) perfectly. The small, felt-lined pocket at the top is perfect for my sunglasses. The material also seems to dissipate odors very well, as this bag gets frequent exposure to sweaty gym clothes (I don't wash it that often, just unzip all the pockets and hang it up to air out).
customer_reviews.author: Randall762

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for school. I carry my MacBook Air, which weighs about 5 pounds, my iPad, wallet, keys, pencil case, and occasionally one textbook. Never more than that. The first backpack I received ripped after about a month of inconsistent use. They switched it out for me. Now the replacement has two rips after another month. I am not hard on this backpack. It is on my shoulder for less than twenty minutes per day, and isn’t used every day. Ridiculous. Love the color, that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with how these ones have held up
customer_reviews.text: The first backpack I've bought where straps weren't already tearing by Christmas! Going on 5 months of use! Usually have to replace their back packs by now! They do carry some very heavy books and they do tend to toss bag when they come in. Very happy with how these ones have held up.
customer_reviews.author: A Fisher-Price Customer

customer_reviews.title: My sons loves it !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I wanted something durable for my son to carry his books in. I can tell you, he is a 12 year old that carries much more than books and binders in there 😝 he’s carried it all year and it still looks brand new! No rips, tears, broke zippers - nothing! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HuggsT

customer_reviews.title: Terrible backpack
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this backpack. I bought this backpack about 4 months ago and I carry everything with me. All my books and my laptop and it is tearing at the seams. Will not last and cannot handle any weight. Might be good for a little kid who doesn't carry anything but for school not a good backpack.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gym bag. I was looking for a good bag to hold my work and gym stuff so that I wouldn't have to carry two bags on my commute. This was the best bag I could find for this purpose. The front shoe pocket is really great for separating my gym shoes from my laptop and other work things. The one area for improvement would be if there were more internal zip pockets. Other bags that I have had have smaller zippered sections inside the bigger zipper sections to keep smaller items organized. For just gym us, this would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack! Bought this for my son for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack! Bought this for my son for Christmas and it has held up really well. He will be using it again this school year. Most backpacks fall apart after so many months of using them daily. This backpack has stood up to all the work and is still going strong! Not only did he use it for the remainder of the school year but he packed all his church camp stuff in it! LOTS of room in this backpack! Will definitely be purchasing more Under Armour backpacks in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kala Sobaszek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has not held up well. The strap at the top of the bag is pulling away from the bag. I have three children in ages from 12-19, this is the worse backpack I have purchased. My youngest sons CVS backpack was better. Very disappointing, after spending so much I have not received any communication about this feedback. I would like a refund or a new backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for the college student who doesn't need something huge ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the reviews that say this is tiny. It's actually more than big enough on the inside but doesn't seem to take up much space on the outside. When I pulled it out of the box, I was immediately worried about the size. It did look tiny. Now, with an extra-long 2 inch binder, a 3 subject notebook, two folders, and my Macbook inside it, it still looks tiny but there is plenty of room on the inside. It's perfect for the college student who doesn't need something huge but needs something just big enough. This is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kiann Foley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack. It is a perfect size for my computer with a nice padded pocket for it. It also has enough room to pack everything I could possibly need to put in there. I recently traveled to NYC with this backpack and it was perfect for under the seat storage. Easy to get in and out of and so comfortable tonwear around the city. Upon my return, I started using it for work because it's such a great bag and the turquoise and lime green is super cute ;)
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: great carry on bag for the bus
customer_reviews.text: this came in handy on our snowmobiling trip in Canada. my hubby wore it on his back as we sledded from hotel to hotel, 1230 miles to be exact ! then the following weekend I used it on my trip to Boston, great carry on bag for the bus ! I highly recommend this bag, it is excellent quality. heavy duty zippers to withstand a lot of tugging
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B Rose

customer_reviews.title: Failed school  buddy
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my son for middle school on the 1st week the zipper broke was able to readjust a few days late the whole bag started to tear. So dissaponinted as we love Under Armor I now half to spend more money on a new backpack for my son only after 2 weeks of school and I cannot even return or replace according to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES GRANGER JR

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely a knock off! No padded wall to protect a laptop. This came from China the pkg label said Hong Kong. The seller is impossible to deal with and tried to bribe me to give a good report- even told me I was a bad customer because I want to return it for a refund . Stay away from this seller- they change their name almost daily to avoid consequences
customer_reviews.author: Leowife1983

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Probably water resistant and looks like it would carry a lot. Unfortunately the material is very thin and feels like thin plastic. You can even see through it if you put it to light. Too much money for something made cheap. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Bisignano

customer_reviews.title: Pretty large, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for first grade (it's the one he picked out himself) after reading another review that said this backpack was a perfect size for her same-aged child. That is crazy--the book bag is huge and thick and completely inappropriate for elementary school kids. My son was heartbroken at the idea of sending it back so we are keeping it for other outings. Just wanted to let other parents know: this is a book bag sized for full grown adults.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Szewczyk

customer_reviews.title: Not durable/cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: My 15 y.o. son used this backpack for school. I purchased it in the middle of April 2019. He used it until the end of May, didn't use it for the summer and by the second week of school in September, it was already falling apart. It lasted less than 3 months, not counting the summer months when he didn't use it. I'm frustrated that I paid for a brand name backpack and it failed miserably. Very poorly made. Will not be purchasing an UA backpack ever again. Kinda want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: LeahBacon

customer_reviews.title: Straps on the bag are terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: This book bags straps broke the second week of school... Horrible quality, my child is very gentle on his things and takes excellent care of his stuff! I couldn't believe how quickly the bag broke . The first strap broke the 2nd week of school and the 2nd strap broke last week. 100% not with the money
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old used this for less than a month before the zipper broke. Ah, but thinking that since there are two, he’d be fine. Nope. That one broke less than one week later. Perhaps this wasn’t a real under armour. Thank goodness we still had an old under armour (same style) that he could use. That one we bought at a popular sports equipment store.
customer_reviews.author: H. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The bag is good size and looks good. But the shoulder straps are not comfortable at all. They get too close to the neck and scratch the neck. I would suggest buy different brand if you going to spend this much money. Review update: this bag's strap broke in three weeks of use. i want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Jasbir Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Appealing design, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The product has a very appealing front exterior design, but I would not recommend it for several reasons: - the backpack is very thin and long. Make sure to check dimensions before you order it (I didn't realize that it was 7 inches wide and literally can't fit more than a laptop and maybe 1-2 books); - straps and the back of the backpack are very stiff; - the quality feels cheap (you are paying for the brand name, the backpack is not worth full retail price of $54.99).
customer_reviews.author: akelle12

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son just entered middle school this year and wanted (of course) to get an Under Armour brand backpack. I purchased the Storm Hustle II, as it provided the right size for him, and had plenty of pockets for his school books, paper, pencils, cell phone, etc. He uses it every day and packs it full of heavy books, the bag probably weighs 25 lbs when full of books and I have seen no signs of issues with the stitching. I will definitely purchase another of these!
customer_reviews.author: John D. Large

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is a piece. Began using it April 8. Broken in two spots. Must be fake Under Armour. BUYER BEWARE. I have pictures of damage, going to try contacting Under Armour. Can't find where to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Doggy Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to find a durable, multi-use backpack in retail stores these days! I could find laptop backpacks, drawstring back "bags", giant hiking packs, etc. I just needed something to hold all my dog's miscellania on daytrips to the dog park. I've always like the functional simplicity of Under Armor's products, and I've had a shirt made by them that's old enough to vote now and it looks like new. So I figured this was a safe bet and it was. A very nice, day-to-day backpack for whatever. (and it DOES have a laptop sleeve inside that you don't have to use).
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Wilbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling, although my son uses this as a school bag. So far it has held up superb. It works great and looks good. Not the uncomfortable pack my parents sent me to school with up hill in the snow. The wife was jealous, so I had to get her one also.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: ripped within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Although I received this backpack on July 8, it only wnet into use on August 7 and has already ripped at the top. I paid three times what I usually pay for a backpack and feel I should be refunded because it is an inferior product. I request Amazon to intervene in this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my stepson who started high school this year. It seems to work well so far. He can cram all 4 books and his folders in it. No rips or tears that we know of. There are quite a few of these in schools so be sure to identify yours in some way. Will update after the school year has passed. UPDATE - Did not last a full school year. At $60 I expected it to. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on December 29th 2018 and Friday at work one of the shoulder straps broke and part of the seam on the top of the backpack is coming apart. I buy under armour for the quality and now I'm starting to rethink things. The return period was only a month. I loved this backpack and I'm extremely disappointed in the quality of this one. It should have lasted me longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: kristine crissinger

customer_reviews.title: Another reason marketing is key. It's all about the name....(sadly)
customer_reviews.text: overpriced but the kids for back to school are convinced that it's the latest trend. Perhaps price more towards the folks who have to buy these for their kids rather then the kids who really wont be buying them and you's sell a lot more. There is nothing about the bag that makes it any better then any other bag out there except having the UA logo. Marketing at its finest
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight backpack for grandpa
customer_reviews.text: My grandpa needed a backpack to use while taking public transportation. He is 86 with some balance issues, so he needed to find a way to carry his groceries while keeping his hands free to hold onto the rails. He wanted something simple, comfortable, and most importantly lightweight. He's very happy with the quality of the backpack. It is spacious without being too big and comfortable on his back and shoulders. He also appreciates the simple design. He's not a huge fan of the complicated bags with a billion little compartments. Added bonus: he says he feels young and hip carrying this backpack. You guys..I have the cutest gramps in the whole world.
customer_reviews.author: Mel M

customer_reviews.title: Product falls apart way to easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product at the end of June for my daughter to start school on August 20th. She started using this backpack on Aug 20th. Here it is Dec 11th, only 3 1/2 months into the school year ( and of her using it), and it is falling apart. The strap is coming apart at the top of the pack. The other shoulder strap came undone at the bottom. The inside lining of one pocket has fraled and came apart as well. I figured this product would last at least the whole school year, not only 3 almost 4 months. Especially with the price of this product. I'm very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this back pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these - blue and white. Solid bag. After many years of using Swiss Army I recently switched to Under Armor. My wife and I use it - she for school, I for work. Holds all of our books, laptops, tablets, cables, etc very well. Difference between this and Swiss Army backpack is - this is narrower and taller. Fits the back profile very well. Much easier to carry. Love that design change.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Suresh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Is Lacking For An Under Armour Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son this backpack for his 8th grade year that just started August 20th 2018 and here we are 1 month later and the seams are pulling apart, the backpack isn't even usable! I'm not at all happy paying good money for a backpack and it's falling apart. I hope this seller makes this right....
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Color is off and quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I was sent the wrong bag or what but the backpack I got was orange when I ordered red. Additionally, the stitching on the straps are poor quality. Not the quality I am used to with under armor.
customer_reviews.author: CeliacDietitian - Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour seems like a popular brand so my son wanted this backpack. The zipper on one section broke and the stitching came apart at the top after only a few months' use. Granted he's a heavy user of it, probably swings it around like most 6th graders would do, but backpacks should be super-enforced at the top where the shoulder straps meet the pack itself, that's a very easy fix. I hand-sewed it together and it seems okay now. Just know the quality of this pack isn't great...
customer_reviews.author: Teri Goldwasser

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a diaper bag! Small zipper fits my bill fold wallet, Bottom zipper holds toys, Front big zipper holds diapers, wipes, changing mat and ziplock with diaper cream, SPF, etc and Back Big zipper Holds lap top, extra outfit, envelope style wristlet. Side mesh is great for foldable reusable shopping bags, keys, bottles of water, phone, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fan

customer_reviews.title: I have washed it in the washing machine a couple of times and it turned out great. I would recommend this backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this backpack since the beginning of this school year. It is very durable. She carries many heavy books in the bookbag and it had held up very well. I have washed it in the washing machine a couple of times and it turned out great. I would recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Check quality before using
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the same backpack for SEVERAL years with no issues. I JUST bought this one for my son (who's 5 months old) to travel on a plane. 1 trip and the inside picket is all frayed. Poor stitching maybe? Not as durable as a previously purchased one.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anne Wingert

customer_reviews.title: socks not books
customer_reviews.text: sure, get this bag if all you plan to carry are stinky sweatsocks and your shoes and phone, but if you plan to use it as a schoolbag as my daughter has then buyer beware. In all her years of school this is the first bag to tear at the shoulder strap and after less than 2 months of use. Let this be a lesson to her about the "cool" brands not always being the best.
customer_reviews.author: thedaveBshow

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail 1 day late. I opened it and it was not what I expected. VERY clearly fake. First of all, it came with a tag for a COMPLETELY different bag. You could tell that it was fake by the many inconsistencies and quality. It felt very light, the colors of certain logos were off, and the location of straps were slightly off. The straps were not ribbed like in the photo, and the carrying handle was the wrong color. Very bad fake, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice backpack with lots of room inside. When is extra nice is that the bottom seems somewhat waterproof on the outside which is a plus when you’re on public transportation during rain or snow. Highly recommend seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag I ordered for myself. Its a real good sturdy bag with several useful pockets. It also holds a 15" laptop inside of it very well and still have much space to place other items inside the bag. I would recommend this bag to anyone because its a good bag with a good design. Its also water proof which is good.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Durable backpack for a bag full of 6th grade books and binders.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter for 6th grade. Normally she has so much in her backpack that they start to tear mid year. This one she carries what feels like about 10lbs of books and it has held up extraordinarily well. The outside is stain and spill resistant - which has always been a problem. I feel that I will be using this one after this school year is over. Highly recommended and price is awesome compared to other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this backpack so much she payed for it with her own money (9 year old) After a month it started to fall apart, literally! I can’t believe that a world renown brand like Under Armour would put their name on this poorly made backpack... Truly disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Giorgiana Springsteen

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap
customer_reviews.text: Backpack looks nice and has plenty of room but is VERY CHEAPLY made. Strap broke off within first couple of weeks of use. Was not overloaded...only carrying notebooks, folders, and lunchbox. Counterfeit product possibly?? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my children for Christmas and they are both in middle school. After the first two weeks of having the book bag one of the straps started to rip on one of the book bags and the other book bag two of the zipper compartments have broke! And this all has happened in less than one month of having them! so I wouldn’t recommend this item for anyone who has kids in middle school or anyone with kids in school period! Oh and when I called back in January they told me “I’m sorry you didn’t order the warranty for it so there is nothing they can do!” NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Monica

customer_reviews.title: Can’t handle a week at Disney
customer_reviews.text: We bought this specifically for a trip to Disney. It did not make it through 4 days of use. The seems are coming apart and now there’s a huge hole in the main compartment. Will be returning as soon as we get home from Disney.
customer_reviews.author: Holly N.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size for 6th grade student.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was purchased for my grandson. The bag seems to be well made, and the colors are very true and bright. The size is perfect for his books, homework and lots of extras from his room to share with friends i.e. basketball etc. Time will tell as to the durability as it will be used daily for school. Grandson loves it so that makes it okay with me.
customer_reviews.author: deann

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. But pockets are not as big as the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 16 yr old granddaughter after her Nike backpack had a main zipper failure (I'm sure due to her overstuffing and not any fault of Nike). She loves it. Very sturdy. But pockets are not as big as the Nike pack that she had. She could use the Nike one not only for school but also for overnight stays with friends. This one does fine for school but cannot double as a "weekender" for a teenager, not even a teenage boy. .
customer_reviews.author: Rita H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! I love that it doesn't stick out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I love that it doesn't stick out very far. I replaced my huge jansport bag with this and my back feels better. I have a dedicated gym bag so I use the dirty laundry pocket for my glasses cases. I only wish there was a dedicated tablet pocket in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for school. It held up through two degrees worth of books. The computer sleeve fit my MacBook Pro perfectly. Now I use it when I fly. It fits all my carry-on items perfectly. It has no rips or tears with all it’s been through. Very reliable and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack. The color is great (lime green) and pockets are useful and help with organization. It would be nice if they made this in a larger size for my older daughter who has to carry a tablet and large binder to middle school (it won't fit).
customer_reviews.author: wyhuntress

customer_reviews.title: Stylin’ for school
customer_reviews.text: My freshman son chose white, but it seems to be holding up well after 4 months. I was a little leery of white, but out of my 4 kids he’s the neatest. I went along with it. He’s kept it fairly nice so far. If your child flings it around everywhere, then don’t get the white. My son is a bit OCD and actually wears his with both straps, so I know it’s not all over the bus floor!
customer_reviews.author: Jokoboco

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my high school daughter on March 1 and the straps have already broken (on Apr 22!). We have used UA backpacks before and been pleased, so I don't know what happened with this one. But I won't be risking buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for how long it is lasting
customer_reviews.text: My oldest has this in red and so far it has held up from K-2 grade. He will definitely get a 4th year out of it or more. So I bought in in blue for my 5yo who will start K in the fall. Good deal for how long it is lasting.
customer_reviews.author: nfolk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and looking for a replacement
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this backpack when she got it. It looks good and has enough room for her middle school books. And she loves the Under Armour brand. Unfortunately, it lasted less than 3 months. She called me from school two days ago to tell me the strap broke off. I was sure it had just come undone, but it had not. She is very disappointed, and I am too. We have gotten more mileage out of $20 Walmart backpacks, but we had just moved overseas in the middle of a school year and she really wanted this one. I would not purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool backpack. Went to school with my new backpack ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool backpack. Went to school with my new backpack and I felt considerably much cooler. If I were in grade school maybe the other kids would have noticed my cool new backpack, but at boring old college, everybody is too busy showing off their own cool backpacks. Not as cool as mine, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I have had this for at least 4 months now with HEAVY use and not showing any signs of wear except where my dog chewed on it. Only minor flaw is the lowest front pocket is EXTREMELY deep, and it's the only pocket of that size. I wish there was one that width and height that wasn't so deep. (Things get really hard to pull out, you have to stick half your arm in to reach all the way down.)
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I like the look
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the look. It's doesn't look loose and hang, and it's a narrow bag. The bottom pocket expands pretty big inside, which you can choose to take advantage of if you want to separate something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: What an Impressive Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for a while now (about 7 months), and it has been through the wash about 3 times, still looking brand-new. There are just no signs of wear and tear, it's very comfortable, and I've even taken it to another country. The bag is used daily for work and is probably the best backpack I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Top name, Top quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my High School aged son. He lugs it back and forth everyday to school and it is holding up perfectly. He seems to find a way to go through at least 1 every year. They usually end up with broken zippers and tears all over it. So far, so good. He is a big fan of Under Armour so this was a risk I was willing to take without ever seeing the Backpack in person. The reviews on Amazon were good enough to convince me to give it a shot. We are glad that we did!
customer_reviews.author: Kalmerica

customer_reviews.title: great bag for my 8th grader
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag, well worth the price the ua bags usually last my kids a few years. My 8th grader uses this bag to lug tons of heavy books to and from school and also uses to carry his basketball stuff in for practices, it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: busymom

customer_reviews.title: Used for two days and it's ripped
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a knockoff! There is no way Under Armour would sell a bag that would rip (front pocket) in two days. All my 15 year old used it for was to go to school and home. I was only replacing the old one he had (same exact thing) that I bought on the UA site last time and he used that for well over a year with no issues. I'm hoping to return this one and just pay for the real thing. Purchased from Top Deals Online
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder straps comes unstitched and pull apart
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter received this backpack for Christmas. She loves the color, all of the pockets and organizers, as well as the capacity to carry all of her school items. The reason that I’m giving it one star is that the stitching on the shoulder straps are pulling away on one side. I am so disappointed that this backpack didn’t hold up for 4.5 months of school bag use—especially since it was so expensive. Sadly the return window long since closed and I’m stuck finding a new backpack 3 weeks before school ends for the year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well made. We purchased this along with the lunch box; it fits perfectly in the backpack and there is a ton of room left for all of my son's books. We went from a very well made (and expensive) Chrome messenger bag to this; I was reluctant to purchase this thinking it would be less durable or of lesser quality than his Chrome messenger (it is 1/4 the price of the Chrome product). My son wanted a change in style this year so we gave this one a try. It's been a month and the backpack still looks brand new, despite the fact that he is rough on it. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old grandson loved backpack!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grandson loved this backpack!!! He told me that no one else would have one like it!!! The bright colors are very easy to see from anywhere, and the compartments are just what a student needs, it is a little larger than we thought it would be, but that is a plus!!! The quality is excellent, and I think it will wear well, and last , even with a 9 year old!!! We would recommend this for any student!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Not UA’s Typical Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack and UA. However, it hasn’t held up as well as I hoped or as well as UA typically does. I have carried it for about 6 months and there are holes between the front and main pocket, and one of the straps is tearing. So, it’s a good pack but not to use for years to come. I’ll have to replace it at about a year. (Side note: I don’t carry heavy things like a computer or books often. So if you do, get another model)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: but for now looks good and will recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well made, lots of room. Being used by my son who is in HS and loads it up fully. It can hold his iPad, and books for all 8 classes, plus lunch and two bottle of 16.9 oz water. Roomier than described, also the zippers are well made. Will follow up after 6 months if anything starts to fail, but for now looks good and will recommend. Also a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: I've been very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack because I was looking for a diaper bag for our newborn. It has exceeded my expectations. What really makes this work as a diaper bag are all the pockets and differently-sized storage areas in the backpack. There are large pockets for diapers, smaller ones for toys and wipes, and even two side pockets for bottles. I've been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Beware:  The worst bag ever made by Under Armour!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying that I've ordered from Amazon a few times a week for at least 5 years now and have never left a bad review before but I couldn't let this one go. The strap on this backpack broke the 2nd day my son used it, I ordered a replacement in exchange, and that one's strap broke the minute my son put it on! I have always purchased Under Armour backpacks do to their durability so this was extremely disappointing. Don't bother going through the hassle. HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: angela brito

customer_reviews.title: Dont order
customer_reviews.text: Dont order!!! Color is not as pictured. You will get a vomit green colored bag. Tried twice and even contacted seller but did not fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. I wish it was a little bigger, but you can still hold pretty much everything you might need. Color is true to what I saw on my monitor. Straps are comfortable. Entire pack is true to UA's standard of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Utter crap
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give a zero star rating, so one it is. Utter crap. My daughter got it for school. One strap severed completely at the lower attach point within three days. Since most textbooks are online now, she didn’t even have it heavily loaded. Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: amorris1pa

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been used for 2 weeks and the strap has already broke! But because I purchased it over the summer for the upcoming school year (over 30 days ago), I can not return it! My daughter has the same backpack and has used it for 5 years so far, so clearly this one is defective! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: dam65627

customer_reviews.title: School Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was used for, specifically, for school and not hiking. It was able to carry a heavy load. I return one because it ripped near the top where the strap joins the backpack. I thought it might have been to much weight. Lo and behold, I received a new one, as the other one was return, and the same thing happen. I was carrying less books in it; so, I was returned it once more. It would work great as a hiking pack, but it did not work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: SCAM - DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Seller is clearly selling knock off backpacks. The backpack that I got did not have any of the features that the Under Armour backpack is supposed to have. The backpack was missing the microfiber material in the front compartment and in the computer sleeve. There was no key ring in the middle pocket. It was also missing the corrugation on the straps and an Under Armour log on the strap. This is a complete scam.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my stuff great
customer_reviews.text: I used to carry around two bags; one for my meds and health stuff and a purse. That got old fast, and this was the perfect solution. It holds all my stuff perfectly. It's definitely big enough to carry a laptop, you could for a game system in it as well.(Probably not both at the same time, though.)
customer_reviews.author: Harley B.

customer_reviews.title: tore within a month!
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a great backpack ...but beware.. its not! we have had it for 6 weeks and inside seam by the zipper is torn! And sadly - just weeks after the return window closed!! what a waste of $45 dollars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sameena

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and tough
customer_reviews.text: Love my green UA bag. Especially the dark green color. And the compartments. It is super light yet tough. However, I'm a 5'3" of height which I feel the bag is quite big (I mean long) for me for everyday use but I still love it. I think it's going to be perfect for traveling though (at least for me).
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack, but way too small for a high school student that has to carry around a lot of books
customer_reviews.author: mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great highschool booksack.
customer_reviews.text: This book-sack is freshman approved. My daughter picked this out as the book-sack she wanted for her freshman year. She said it met all the criteria for her needs for a book-bag. the color is nice and subtle and very clean looking. It is large enough to hold their school books and this book-sack is really well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelle225

customer_reviews.title: Crap product!
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't even had this product for 2 months and the strap has already torn! His last back pack lasted for 3 years, but it was not Under Armour. Of course Amazon only gives a short return policy so of course I can't return it now. Next time I will buy from a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca hasmann

product_meta.title: Under Armour Storm Hustle II Backpack
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology delivers an element-battling, highly water-resistant finish. Tough, abrasion-resistant bottom panel. Soft-lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15” MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop . Water-repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe. Adjustable HeatGear shoulder straps for extra comfort. 2 side water bottle pockets. Top grab handle. Large, gusseted front laundry pocket. Dimensions: 18" x 13" x 8". Cubic Volume: 1875.
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology delivers an element battling, highly water resistant finish
Soft lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15" MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop
Water repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe
Adjustable HeatGear shoulder straps for extra comfort
